meanings.definition: A discoloration or mark caused by a foreign substance.
meanings.sent1: The red stain on the carpet was from the spilled juice.
meanings.sent2: She tried to remove the stain from her shirt with a stain remover.
meanings.sent3: The stain on his face made him look like a messy painter.
meanings.sent4: The stain of betrayal was etched in her heart forever.
meanings.sent5: The dark stain on the wall seemed to grow bigger each day.

meanings.definition: To mark or discolor with something that is not easily removed.
meanings.sent1: Please don't stain the table with your marker.
meanings.sent2: The spilled coffee will stain the white tablecloth.
meanings.sent3: He accidentally stained his hands with ink while writing.
meanings.sent4: The reputation of the company was stained by the scandal.
meanings.sent5: The tears will stain her cheeks as she weeps.
